title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; file uploads, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function calling, and deployment patterns.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module exposing Ollama as a REST microservice with Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio streaming and Serde models.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama; desktop & mobile support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and push models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open-WebUI, GPU or CPU.

title: ollama-kotlin-multiplatform
summary: Experimental Kotlin Multiplatform SDK for Ollama (JVM, JS, Native).

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG chatbot using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain with PDF ingestion.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.
